content: designed for coziness and comfort this super soft baby blanket will be cherished by your little one this pattern features stitches such as double_crochet and wide half_double_crochet as well as the popular puff it also features color changes which help bring the velvet flowers to life select your favorite shades of bernat baby velvet yarn or work it up as shown bernat baby velvet is machine washable and dryable plus it is oeko-tex certified making it perfect for baby projects as it is free of harmful substances
